metadata.titleEn: Zircon Hf isotopic data set of Mesozoic Cenozoic magmatic rocks and Mesozoic Yidun Granitoids in the southern Tibetan Plateau, Lhasa Block (2022)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原南部拉萨地块中-新生代岩浆岩和藏东南中生代义敦花岗岩类锆石Hf同位素数据集（2022）
metadata.description: The dataset mainly includes zircon Hf isotope data of Mesozoic and Cenozoic granitoids and some dykes in the central and western Lhasa massif, southern Tibet. This data is mainly used to study the origin of various magmatic rocks related to Neotethys subduction at the convergent plate margin, and to constrain the subduction process; The study of the genesis of various magmatic rocks during the syn collision between India and Eurasia is of great significance to the study of the net growth of continental crust and the genesis of silicon rich continental crust; The study of the genesis of various post collisional magmatic rocks is of great significance to the discussion of the mechanism of post collisional tectonomagmatism and the crust mantle structure; It is of great significance to study the petrogenesis of volcanic rocks in the collision zone and the origin of temporal and spatial variations of enriched components in magma for using petrological evidence to constrain the time limit of Indo Eurasian collision. In addition, the data set also includes zircon Hf isotope data of late Triassic granitoids from Yidun terrane in the eastern Qinghai Tibet Plateau, which can be used to study the origin of large batholiths at the margin of convergent plates and determine the genetic mechanism of silicon rich continental crust. 60 sets of test samples, excluding repeated sample testing, are tested by MC-ICP-MS, and the testing unit is China University of Geosciences (Beijing). The data comes from published articles, which are true and reliable. It can be applied to the study of magmatic rock genesis.
metadata.descriptionCn: 该数据集主要包括藏南拉萨地块中部和西部的中生代、新生代花岗岩类和部分脉岩锆石Hf同位素数据。该数据主要用来研究汇聚板块边缘新特提斯洋俯冲相关各类岩浆岩的成因，并以之约束俯冲过程；研究印度-欧亚大陆同碰撞期间各类岩浆岩的成因，对探究大陆地壳净生长与富硅大陆地壳成因具有重要意义；研究碰撞后各类岩浆岩的成因，对探讨后碰撞构造岩浆作用的机制和壳幔结构具有重要意义；研究碰撞带火山岩的岩石成因和岩浆中富集组分时空变化的起源，对利用岩石学证据约束印度—欧亚碰撞时限具有重要意义。此外，该数据集还包括青藏高原东部义敦地体晚三叠世花岗岩类的锆石Hf同位素数据，可以用来研究汇聚板块边缘大型岩基的成因研究，厘定富硅大陆地壳成因机制。测试样品60套，不包括重复样品检测，采用MC-ICP-MS，测试单位为中国地质大学（北京）。数据来源于已经发表文章，数据真实可靠。可以应用于岩浆岩石成因研究。
metadata.instructions:
Zircon Hf isotope data is stored in Excel format. The file name is "Zircon Hf 2022. xlsx", where Zircon Hf represents content and 2022 represents year.
Data reading method: The data can be directly opened in Excel workbook.
metadata.instructionsCn:
锆石Hf同位素数据以Excel格式存储，文件名称为“Zircon Hf 2022.xlsx”，其中Zircon Hf代表内容，2022代表年份。
数据读取方式：该数据可以直接用Excel工作簿打开。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many zircon Hf isotope samples were tested using MC-ICP-MS in a dataset related to the magmatic rocks of the southern Tibetan Plateau and Yidun granites?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与南藏高原和宜顿花岗岩相关的岩浆岩数据集中，使用MC-ICP-MS测试了多少个锆石Hf同位素样品？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for using zircon Hf isotopic data to understand the genesis of magmatic rocks in convergent plate boundaries?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 什么原因导致需要使用锆石Hf同位素数据来理解汇聚板块边界的岩浆岩成因？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The use of zircon Hf isotopic data is necessitated by the need to study the genesis of various magmatic rocks associated with the subduction of the Neo-Tethys Ocean at convergent plate boundaries, to constrain the subduction processes, and to explore the net growth of continental crust and the origin of silica-rich continental crust during the India-Eurasia collision.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用锆石铪同位素数据是为了研究与新特提斯洋俯冲相关的各种岩浆岩的成因，以约束俯冲过程，并探索大陆地壳的净增长以及在印度-欧亚碰撞期间富硅大陆地壳的起源。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential impacts on the understanding of crustal growth and silicic continental crust formation when integrating zircon Hf isotopic data from Mesozoic and Cenozoic igneous rocks?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自中生代和新生代火成岩的锆石Hf同位素数据对地壳生长和硅酸盐大陆地壳形成的理解可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating zircon Hf isotopic data from Mesozoic and Cenozoic igneous rocks can significantly enhance the understanding of crustal growth and silicic continental crust formation by providing insights into the genesis of magmatic rocks related to subduction processes and the mechanisms of post-collision tectonic magmatism. This data sheds light on the composition and evolution of the crust-mantle structure and helps constrain the timing of India-Eurasia collision events, thereby offering crucial evidence for crustal development and enrichment processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合来自中生代和新生代火成岩的锆石铪同位素数据可以显著增强对地壳生长和硅质大陆地壳形成的理解，提供与俯冲过程相关的岩浆岩成因的见解，以及后碰撞构造岩浆作用的机制。这些数据揭示了地壳-地幔结构的组成和演化，并有助于限制印度-欧亚碰撞事件的时间，从而为地壳发展和富集过程提供重要证据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental and procedural methodologies are used to collect zircon Hf isotope data from Mesozoic and Cenozoic igneous rocks in southern Tibet and eastern Tibetan Plateau, and how do these methods ensure the reliability of the isotopic data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在收集南藏和东藏高原的中生代和新生代火成岩的锆石Hf同位素数据时，使用了哪些仪器和程序方法，这些方法如何确保同位素数据的可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The instrumental methodology used to collect zircon Hf isotope data involves MC-ICP-MS (Multi-Collector Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry), conducted by the China University of Geosciences (Beijing). This method is chosen for its precision and accuracy in isotopic analysis. Procedurally, the dataset includes 60 sets of test samples, excluding repeated sample tests, which ensures that the data is reliable and valid for research purposes. The data originates from published articles, adding an additional layer of credibility.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 用于收集锆石Hf同位素数据的仪器方法涉及多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICP-MS），由中国地质大学（北京）进行。选择这种方法是因为其在同位素分析中的精确性和准确性。程序上，数据集包括60组测试样本，不包括重复样本测试，这确保了数据的可靠性和有效性以供研究使用。数据来源于已发表的文章，增加了额外的可信度。
